$comment: This file controls ALL dropdown options, labels, tooltips, defaults, and validation for:
- Backend (Node.js): systems.ts validates + AgentManager uses defaults via config/uiOptions.ts
- Windows Tray: build.ps1 generates C# at build-time
- Frontend: Changes appear immediately (Vite hot reload)
- Backend: JSON inlined at compile time, rebuild Docker to apply
- Windows: Run build.ps1 to regenerate ui-options_auto-generated.cs
- Linux: Should be used the same way for linux agents when they are implemented
- labels: UI text for each setting
- values: Add/remove/reorder dropdown options (UI + backend validation uses this array)
- default: Default value for new agent initializations + UI pre-selection
NOTE: Adding NEW settings requires code changes. Editing existing values = JSON only.
REQUIRES: PowerShell 7+ for build.ps1 (supports // comments), but avoid using // comments
description: Shared UI configuration options for Pankha frontend and agent tray applications.

fanControl.label: Fan Control
fanControl.description: Enable or disable Fan Speed Control.
fanControl.tooltip:
Enable or disable Fan Speed Control.
When disabled, the agent will ignore all fan speed commands (client system takes control).

logLevel.label: Log Level
logLevel.tooltip:
"Log Level" is the Agent logging verbosity. Currently set to {logLevel}.
TRACE  : very detailed debug info 
DEBUG : detailed diagnostics 
INFO    : normal operation logs (default) 
WARN  : warnings and errors 
ERROR : errors only.

emergencyTemp.label: Emergency °C
emergencyTemp.description: Temperature threshold that overrides all controls.
emergencyTemp.tooltip:
"Emergency Temperature" {emergencyTemp}°C is the temperature threshold that overrides all controls.
Sets fans to 100% immediately, bypassing Fan Step and Hysteresis for safety.
Fan Control must be enabled for this to take effect.

failsafeSpeed.label: Failsafe Speed
failsafeSpeed.description: Fan speed when backend connection is lost.
failsafeSpeed.tooltip:
"Failsafe Speed" is the Fan speed {failsafeSpeed}% set when backend connection is lost (Agent goes into failsafe mode).
Warning: 0% allows fans to stop only overridden by "Emergency Temperature" Threshold.

updateInterval.label: Agent rate
updateInterval.tooltip:
Agent rate is the Agent data collection interval ({agentInterval}s).
How often the agent collects sensor data.
Lower = more responsive, higher = less agent CPU usage.

fanStep.label: Fan Step
fanStep.description: Max fan speed % change per update cycle.
fanStep.tooltip:
"Fan Step" is the Max fan speed {fanStep}% change every update cycle of (Agent Rate) {agentInterval}s.
Smooth transitions reduce fan wear.
Lower % = slower, smoother. Disable = instant (jerky).

hysteresis.label: Hysteresis
hysteresis.description: Temperature tolerance before adjusting fan speed.
hysteresis.tooltip:
"Hysteresis" is the Temperature tolerance ({hysteresis}°C) before adjusting fan speed.
Prevents constant small adjustments.
Higher values = more stability, lower values = more responsive cooling.
